name: South of Market Health Center
description: Established in 1973, South of Market Health Center (SMHC) is a private, non-profit community health center that offers affordable medical services to the low income community.
fullDescription: Established in 1973, South of Market Health Center (SMHC) is a private, non-profit community health center that offers affordable medical services to the low income community.
